text:
I am very new to apache and have now downloaded several different .msi
installers. All open and attempt to run but then say that the installion was
interrupted. Any help would be great. I am running XP with SP2 and all updates
to this date.
creator: blitzertidus@hotmail.com

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> I am very new to apache and have now downloaded several different .msi
> installers. All open and attempt to run but then say that the installion was
> interrupted. Any help would be great. I am running XP with SP2 and all updates
> to this date.

Had same problem too. From msiexec log I found a problem related to binding tcp
socket. I had multiple network cards (physical and virtual). Disabled all
network cards but one... then launched .msi file and all worked fine. re-enabled
all network cards and no problem at all.
creator: boverat@netscape.net
wrowe@apache.org
text: Not a support forum, see the peer user support list if you still have issues.
